1.name: Trials of Twilight II
1.description:
Gain 2 Xin Zhaos and a Bloodthirster. Xin Zhao becomes an Attack Fighter. After 5 player combats as a 3-star, unlock Zaahen. 

At the start of the next ? stages, gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

1.name: Component Buffet
1.description:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component now.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

1.name: Pandora's Items
1.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized. 

Gain 1 random component.

1.name: Small Grab Bag
1.description: Gain 2 random item components.

1.name: Trials of Twilight
1.description: Gain 2 Xin Zhao. Your strongest Xin Zhao constantly strikes nearby enemies and executes enemies. After 5 player combats as a 3-star, unlock Zaahen. He replaces Xin Zhao and takes his items.

1.name: Air Axiom
1.description: Gain an Air Hex. Champions within gain 25% Attack Speed and their damage 30% Sunders enemies for 5 seconds.

1.name: Augmented Power
1.description: Your next augment is one tier higher.

1.name: Backup Bows
1.description:
Gain a Recurve Bow. After your team attacks 1000 times, gain 2 more.

Attacks: ?

1.name: Band of Thieves
1.description: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

1.name: Big Friend I
1.description: Allies that start combat next to an ally with over 1750 Health gain 10% Durability.

1.name: Called Shot
1.description: Set your win streak to 4. Gain 4 gold.

1.name: Celestial Blessing I
1.description: Your team gains 12% Omnivamp. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 200 Health.

1.name: Chaotic Evolution
1.description: Starring up a champion grants them one of the following: 100 Health, 6% Durability, 10% Ability Power, 10% Attack Damage, 10% Attack Speed. Bonuses stack.

1.name: Continuous Conjuration
1.description:
Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. After your team deals 38000 magic damage, gain 2 more.

Damage dealt: ?

1.name: Corrosion
1.description: Enemy champions in the first two rows lose 4 Armor and Magic Resist every 2 seconds.

1.name: Earth Axiom
1.description: Gain an Earth Hex. Champions within gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist. At 50% Health, they Stun enemies within 2 hexes for 1.5 seconds.

1.name: Exiles I
1.description: Your champions that start combat with no adjacent champions gain a 20% max Health shield for 10 seconds.

1.name: Extra Buckles
1.description:
Gain a Giant's Belt. After your team takes 75000 damage, gain 2 more.

Damage taken: ?

1.name: Eye For An Eye
1.description:
For every 15 ally champions that die, gain a random component (max 3).

Deaths Remaining: ?

1.name: Eye For An Eye+
1.description:
Gain a random component. For every 18 ally champions that die, gain another component (max 2).

Deaths Remaining: ?

1.name: Find Your Center
1.description: Your champion that starts combat in the center of the front row gains 15% Damage Amp and 15% max Health.

1.name: Fire Axiom
1.description: Gain a Fire Hex. Champions within gain 15% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Their damage 1% Burns and 33% Wounds for 6 seconds.

1.name: Firesale
1.description: Each round, steal a random 3-cost or lower champion from the shop. Gain 1 gold.

1.name: Flowing Tears
1.description:
Gain a Tear of the Goddess. After your team spends 6500 Mana, gain 2 more.

Mana spent: ?

1.name: Focused Fire
1.description: Your team gains 5% Attack Damage. Every 5 seconds, they gain 5% more.

1.name: Glass Cannon I
1.description: Allies that start combat in the back row begin combat at 80% Health but gain 17% Damage Amp.

1.name: Good For Something I
1.description: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% chance to drop 1 gold on death.

1.name: Iron Assets
1.description: Gain a component anvil and 3 gold.

1.name: Item Grab Bag
1.description: Gain 1 random completed item.

1.name: Latent Forge
1.description:
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil. 

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

1.name: Lineup
1.description: Your team gains 2 Armor and Magic Resist for each ally that starts combat in the front two rows.

1.name: One Twos Three
1.description: Gain 1 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

1.name: Placebo
1.description: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 8 gold.

1.name: Placebo+
1.description: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 14 gold.

1.name: Risky Moves
1.description: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

1.name: Rolling For Days I
1.description: Gain 10 free Shop rerolls.

1.name: Second Wind
1.description: After 10 seconds of combat, your team heals 40% of their missing Health.

1.name: Silver Destiny
1.description: Gain a random Silver Augment and 2 gold.

1.name: Silver Spoon
1.description: Gain 10 XP.

1.name: Slice of Life
1.description: Twice per stage, gain a random champion. Its cost increases by Stage. This effect ends after receiving 1 5-cost champion.

1.name: Slightly Magic Roll
1.description:
Roll a die. Gain rewards based on the number rolled.

Reward: ?

1.name: Table Scraps
1.description: After the next 2 carousels, gain one champion that was not taken and its item. Gain 1 gold.

1.name: Team Building
1.description:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 5 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

1.name: Titanic Titan
1.description: Increase your current and max player Health by 25. On carousel rounds you are released earlier, but are much slower.

1.name: Water Axiom
1.description: Gain a Water Hex. Champions within gain 3 Mana Regen. Their damage 30% Shreds enemies for 5 seconds.

1.name: Artillery Barrage
1.description: Gain a Rumble. Your strongest Rumble gains +7 Range and constantly fires missiles at enemies, increased with Attack Speed.

1.name: Boxing Lessons
1.description: Your team gains 30 Health for each ally that starts combat in the front row.

1.name: Carve a Path
1.description:
Gain a B.F. Sword. After your team deals 65000 physical damage, gain 2 more.

Damage dealt: ?

1.name: Crafted Crafting
1.description: Whenever you craft a completed item, gain 2 rerolls.

1.name: Critical Success
1.description:
Gain a Sparring Glove. After your team's attacks critically strike 320 times, gain 2 more.

Critical strikes: ?

1.name: Delayed Start
1.description: Sell your board and bench. Gain 4 random 2-star 1-cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds.

1.name: Efficient Shopper
1.description: For the next 4 carousels, gain a second copy of the champion taken.

1.name: Healing Orbs I
1.description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 220.

1.name: Late Game Specialist
1.description: When you reach Level 9, gain 36 gold.

1.name: Leap of Faith
1.description: Gain an Illaoi. Your strongest Illaoi becomes a Fighter. Her Ability is replaced with an airborne slam that's recast when she kills her target.

1.name: Lunch Money
1.description:
Every 7 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.
Total Payouts: ? Gold

1.name: Makeshift Armor I
1.description: Allies without items equipped gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

1.name: Missed Connections
1.description: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

1.name: On a Roll
1.description: Whenever you star up a champion that you fielded last combat, gain 2 free Shop rerolls. Gain 2 gold.

1.name: One, Two, Five!
1.description: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

1.name: Patience is a Virtue
1.description: Each round, gain 2 free rerolls if you did not buy a champion last round.

1.name: Silver Destiny+
1.description: Gain a random Silver Augment and 4 gold.

1.name: Spoils of War I
1.description: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

1.name: Teaming Up
1.description: Gain 1 random component and 2 random 3-cost champions.

1.name: Twin Guardians
1.description: If you have exactly 2 allies in your first row, grant them 50 Armor and 50 Magic Resist.

1.name: Wood Axiom
1.description: Gain a Wood Hex. Champions within gain 15% max Health. After combat, they permanently gain 40 Health.

1.name: Best Friends I
1.description: Allies isolated in pairs gain 10% Attack Speed and 10 Armor at the start of combat.

1.name: Branching Out
1.description: Gain a random Emblem.

1.name: Branching Out+
1.description:
Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

1.name: Dummify
1.description: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Training Dummy with 80% of their combined health. The dummy gains 1200 Health per stage.

1.name: Preparation I
1.description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 30 Health, 3% Attack Damage, and 3% Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

1.name: Recombobulator
1.description: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

1.name: Restart Mission
1.description: Remove all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs, 3 2-star 2-costs, and 1 2-star 1-cost champion.

1.name: Stand United
1.description:
Gain 2% Attack Damage and 1.5% Ability Power for each non-unique Trait active across your team.

Current Bonus: ?% 
  ?%

1.name: Survivor
1.description: Gain 4 gold. After 3 players are eliminated, gain 100 more gold.

2.name: Portable Forge
2.description:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

2.name: The Ruined King
2.description: Gain a 2-star Viego. Your strongest Viego shares 30% of his Passive with other Shadow Isles allies. After collecting 100 souls, his Ability upgrades.

2.name: Ascension
2.description: After 12 seconds of combat, gain 45% Damage Amp.

2.name: Big Grab Bag
2.description:
Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger. 

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

2.name: Celestial Blessing II
2.description: Your team gains 18% Omnivamp. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 400 Health.

2.name: Exclusive Customization
2.description:
Gain a Lucky Item Chest and a Magnetic Remover and 10 gold.

Use a Lucky Item Chest on a champion to choose from an armory of recommended items!

2.name: Jeweled Lotus I
2.description: Your team gains 20% Critical Strike Chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

2.name: Mace's Will
2.description: Gain a Sparring Gloves. Your team gains 8% Attack Speed and 20% Critical Strike Chance.

2.name: Max Build
2.description:
Gain 10 free Shop rerolls. On Stage 4-5 and 6-1, gain a Champion Duplicator.

Galaxies Championship, 2020

2.name: Pandora's Items II
2.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 2 random components.

2.name: ReinFOURcement
2.description: The next 4-cost champion you buy with gold is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 5 gold.

2.name: Silco's Revenge
2.description: Zaunites explode into Shimmer on death, dealing 30% of their max Health to 2 nearby enemies as magic damage. Gain a Blitzcrank, an Ekko, and a Vi.

2.name: Spear's Will
2.description: Your team gains 12% Attack Damage and 5 Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.

2.name: Thorn-Plated Armor
2.description: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 20-170% more damage (based on Stage).

2.name: Unsealed From Steel
2.description: Choose 1 of 4 Darkin Weapons. Darkin Weapons are Artifacts that grant the Darkin trait.

2.name: A Magic Roll
2.description:
Roll 3 dice. Gain rewards based on their total.

Reward: ?

2.name: Advanced Loan+
2.description: Gain 33 Gold. Your next augment is one tier lower.

2.name: Birthday Reunion
2.description:
Gain a random 2-star 2-cost champion. When you reach Level 7, gain a Thief's Gloves. When you reach Level 9, gain a random 2-star 5-cost champion.

Inkborn Fables Tactician's Crown, 2024

2.name: Blood Offering
2.description: Gain a Bloodthirster. Combat start: Allies holding Bloodthirsters lose 20% Health but gain a 30% Health shield and 10% Attack Damage.

2.name: Care Package
2.description: Now and at the start of the next 2 Stages, receive a care package with loot and 3 gold.

2.name: Cosmic Calling
2.description: Gain a Spear of Shojin and a Leona. On Stage 3-7, gain a Taric.

2.name: Crown's Will
2.description: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your team gains 12 Ability Power and 10 Armor.

2.name: Darkwill's Invasion
2.description: Your team gains 10% Damage Amp, increased to 15% if the Noxus trait is active.

2.name: Deadlier Blades
2.description: Gain a Deathblade. Deathblades permanently gain 0% Attack Damage whenever their holders score a takedown.

2.name: Deadlier Caps
2.description: Gain a Rabadon's Deathcap. Rabadon's Deathcaps permanently gain null% Ability Power whenever their holders score a takedown.

2.name: Defense of the Placidium
2.description: Your team gains 8% Durability, increased to 12% if the Ionia trait is active.

2.name: Demacia Forever
2.description: Demacians gain 3 permanent Health every time they rally. They also gain 1.5% permanent Attack Damage and Ability Power every 3 rallies. Gain a Jarvan IV, a Sona, and a Xin Zhao.

2.name: Double Trouble
2.description: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 30% Attack Damage and 30% Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

2.name: Early Learnings
2.description:
Your team gains 8% Attack Damage & Ability Power. This increases by 1% after each player combat. 1-cost champions gain double.
?
TFT Vegas Open, 2023

2.name: Epic Rolldown
2.description:
When you reach Level 8, gain 20 Shop rerolls.

Runeterra Reforged Championship, 2023

2.name: Epoch
2.description: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 4 XP and 3 free rerolls.

2.name: Evolve and Overcome
2.description:
For every 5 enemies that Mutated Void allies takedown, gain 2 XP. Gain a Cho'Gath and a 2-star Kog'Maw. ?

Void provides unique Mutations.

2.name: Explosive Growth
2.description: Now and at the start of the next 3 rounds, gain 7 XP.

2.name: Explosive Growth+
2.description: Now and at the start of the next 3 rounds, gain 10 XP.

2.name: Feed the Flames
2.description: Gain a Sunfire Cape. Your team gains 12% Omnivamp when attacking Burning enemies.

2.name: Gain @Gold@ Gold
2.description: Gain 21 gold.

2.name: Gilded Steel
2.description:
Gain 3 non-Tank 5-cost champions. If you field a 5-cost champion, your 1 to 4-cost champions gain 8% Durability.

K.O. Coliseum Championship, 2025

2.name: Glass Cannon II
2.description: Allies that start combat in the back row begin combat at 80% Health but gain 30% Damage Amp.

2.name: Gold Destiny
2.description: Gain a random Gold Augment and 3 gold.

2.name: Healing Orbs II
2.description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 440.

2.name: Heavy Is the Crown
2.description: Gain a Crown of Demacia, which provides significant bonuses to the wearer. If the holder dies, lose the round.

2.name: Heroic Grab Bag
2.description:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 5 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

2.name: Heroic Grab Bag+
2.description:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 8 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

2.name: Heroic Grab Bag++
2.description:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 14 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

2.name: High Voltage
2.description: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +3 hex radius and do 20% more damage.

2.name: Hustler
2.description:
You no longer gain interest but gain 3 gold at the start of every player combat round. Gain 6 gold now.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

2.name: Indecision I
2.description: In 3 rounds, choose a new augment of the same tier. Gain 5 gold now.

2.name: Indecision II
2.description: In 3 rounds, choose a new augment of the same tier. Gain 8 gold now.

2.name: Indiscriminate Killer
2.description: Gain a Giant Slayer. Giant Slayers gain their Damage Amp against all enemies instead of just Tanks.

2.name: Infinity Protection
2.description:
Gain 4 gold now. On Stage 3-7, gain an Infinity Force. Infinity Force gives allies in the same row a 15% Health shield.

Monsters Attack Championship, 2023

2.name: Last Second Save
2.description: The first time each ally falls below 35% Health, they restore 20% maximum Health.

2.name: Lifting Competition
2.description:
At the start of each round, if the combined Health of all your unique Bruisers is high enough, gain a reward and increase the threshold (up to four times). Gain a Shen and a Sion.

?? / ?

2.name: Malicious Monetization
2.description:
Gain 2 gold. For the next 3 rounds, enemy champions drop 2 gold when killed.

?

2.name: Mess Hall
2.description:
After 10 seconds of combat, your champions gain 8% Attack Speed and attacks also hurl 2 delicious projectiles that deal 25 (
) magic damage.

2.name: NO SCOUT NO PIVOT
2.description:
Champions that fight in player combat cannot be benched or sold. Your team gains 1% Health, and 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power after player combat. 

?

2.name: Pandora's Bench
2.description: At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost. Gain 6 gold.

2.name: Patient Study
2.description: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

2.name: Plot Armor
2.description: Your team gains 8 Armor and Magic Resist. After falling below 50% Health, increase this to 40 for the rest of combat.

2.name: Precision and Grace
2.description: At the start of combat, allies gain 25% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. On takedown, allies dash to their next target and gain this bonus again.

2.name: Prizefighter
2.description: Gain 2 item components. Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

2.name: Pyromaniac
2.description: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal 50% increased damage.

2.name: Raining Gold
2.description: Gain 7 gold now and 1 gold every round.

2.name: Replication
2.description: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

2.name: Salvage Bin
2.description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 8 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

2.name: Salvage Bin+
2.description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

2.name: Seraphim's Staff
2.description: Gain an Archangel's Staff. Archangel's Staff grants 2 additional Mana Regen if its holder has 90% or more Ability Power.

2.name: Slammin'
2.description: Gain 1 random component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

2.name: Slammin'+
2.description: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

2.name: Solo Leveling
2.description: For the next 5 combats, your team size is 1 but the champion you field has massively increased stats. Gain 1 XP for every kill they get. Afterwards, gain 2 item components.

2.name: Speedy Double Kill
2.description:
Gain a Guinsoo's Rageblade. When 2 players are eliminated, gain 40 gold.

Fates Championship, 2021

2.name: Spirit Link
2.description: Champions restore 5% of their max Health every 4 seconds. Increase the healing by 0.5% for every 10 missing player Health.

2.description: Gain a Spirit Visage. Every 5 seconds, Spirit Visage heals allies within 1 hex for 7.5% of their missing Health.

2.name: Staffsmith
2.description: Gain 2 random completed items that build from Needlessly Large Rod.

2.name: Stars Are Born
2.description: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

2.name: Swordsmith
2.description: Gain 2 random completed items that build from B.F. Sword.

2.name: Tons of Stats!
2.description: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4% Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

2.name: Trade Sector
2.description: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 4 gold.

2.name: Two Much Value
2.description: Gain 1 reroll for every 2 unique 2-cost champions fielded last player combat. Gain 2 2-cost champions.

2.name: Two Trick
2.description: Gain a random 2-star 2-cost and 2 random 2-star 1-cost champions.

2.name: Warlord's Honor
2.description: Every round, your team gain 5% Attack Damage and Ability Power, stacking up to 4 times.

2.name: 3 Threes
2.description: Gain 3 random 2-star 3-cost champions and 3 gold.

2.description: Gain 20 Gold. Your next augment is one tier lower.

2.description:
After 8 seconds of combat, stun the enemy team for 1.5 seconds. Repeat this after 20 seconds of combat.

2.name: Bodyguard Training
2.description:
Allies gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist, increased by 3 per player level.

2.description: Gain 2 random 5-cost champions and 2 copies of a random component.

2.description: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 8 XP and 3 free rerolls.

2.description: Your champions that start combat with no adjacent champions gain a 30% max Health shield for 10 seconds.

You cannot choose your Carousel rewards. Gain an additional 6 player Health and 10 Gold each carousel round.

2.description: Gain a Steadfast Heart. Every 10 seconds of combat its holder survives, Steadfast Heart gains additional null permanent max Health.

2.description: Gain 1 random Emblem. At the start of every Stage, gain a random Emblem. Your team gains 40 Health for each Emblem they are holding.

2.name: Ixtal Expeditionist
2.description: Gain a Qiyana, a Neeko, and a Milio. Increase your current and max player Health by 10.

2.name: Spreading Roots
2.description: Gain 2 random Emblems and 1 gold.

2.name: Spreading Roots+
2.description: Gain 2 random Emblems, a Reforger, and 2 gold.

2.name: Treasure Hunt
2.description: Gain a locked chest each Stage between now and Stage null. Unlock each chest when you spend null gold on Shop rerolls. These chests persist until opened.

2.name: U.R.F
2.description: Gain a Spatula. Champions holding Spatula or Frying Pan items gain 15% Attack Speed and 2 Mana Regen.

2.name: Warpath
2.description:
Gain a 2-star 2-cost champion. After dealing 80 player damage, gain a chest of high cost champions and items.
(Current: ?)

2.name: Wild Growth
2.description: 3-star Yordles become massive, moving slower but gaining 15% Health and 35% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a Rumble and Lulu.

3.name: Dragonguards
3.description: Gain a Shyvana and a 2-star Jarvan IV. When Jarvan casts, Shyvana gains Shield. When Shyvana casts, Jarvan jumps in and deals damage based on his Armor and Magic Resist. After every player combat, gain a Jarvan IV.

3.name: Growth Mindset
3.description: Gain 50 XP.

3.name: Jeweled Lotus II
3.description: Your team gains 25% Critical Strike Chance and 10% Critical Strike Damage, and their Abilities can critically strike.

3.name: Pandora's Items III
3.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized. 

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

3.name: Radiant Relics
3.description:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

3.name: Soul Awakening
3.description: Combat start: Your team gains 2% Attack Damage and Ability Power per second for 10 seconds. At max stacks, deal 12% bonus true damage.

3.name: Band of Thieves II+
3.description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves. After 6 player combats, gain another.

3.name: Band of Thieves II++
3.description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves. After 3 player combats, gain another.

3.name: Belt Overflow
3.description: Gain 4 Giant's Belts. Your Giant's Belts grant +85 bonus Health.

3.name: Buried Treasures
3.description: Gain a random item component now and at the start of the next 5 rounds.

3.name: Call to Chaos
3.description:
Gain a powerful and random reward.

Reward: ?

3.name: Celestial Blessing III
3.description: Your team gains 25% Omnivamp. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 1000 Health.

3.name: Chosen Wolves
3.description: Gain an Ambessa and a Kindred. When Kindred casts, Ambessa always gains their protection against death and gains Attack Damage while protected. When Ambessa casts, Wolf strikes all enemies hit, dealing reduced damage.

3.name: Comeback Story
3.description:
Your team gains 5 Health and 0.4000000059604645% Attack Speed per missing player Health.

?

3.name: Commerce Core
3.description: Gain 16 free Shop rerolls now and 2 every round for the rest of the game.

3.name: Construct a Companion
3.description: The next 1-cost champion you buy is 3 star. Gain 2 gold.

3.name: Coronation
3.description: Gain a Tactician's Crown. Tactician's Crown, Shield, and Cape grant the holder an additional 20% Attack Speed, 25% Attack Damage, and 30% Ability Power.

3.name: Expected Unexpectedness
3.description: Now and at the start of the next 2 stages, roll 3 dice. Gain various rewards based on their total.

3.name: Giant and Mighty
3.description: Your team becomes large, gaining 200 Health and 10% max Health.

3.name: Going Long
3.description:
You no longer gain interest. Gain 15 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

3.name: Hold the Line
3.description: Allies in your back 2 rows gain 10% Ability Power and 9% Attack Damage for each ally that starts combat in your front row.

3.name: Invested++
3.description: Gain 40 gold. After every combat, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

3.name: Level Up!
3.description: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 12 immediately.

3.name: Lucky Gloves
3.description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

3.name: Lucky Gloves+
3.description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves now, then another after 4 player combats.

3.name: Min-Max
3.description:
Gain a Golden Item Remover and 4 random components.

Golden Item Remover is a Magnetic Remover with infinite uses.

3.name: Money Monsoon
3.description: Gain 7 gold now and every round for the rest of the game.

3.name: Nine Lives
3.description: Set your current and max player Health to 9. On combat loss, you only lose 1 health and gain loot. You can't gain health.

3.name: One Buff, Two Buff
3.description: Gain a Red Buff, a Blue Buff, and a Champion Duplicator.

3.name: Prismatic Destiny+
3.description: Gain a random Prismatic Augment and 10 gold.

3.name: Prismatic Ticket
3.description: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 50% chance to gain a free reroll.

3.name: Radiant Rascal
3.description:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

3.name: Starter Kit
3.description:
Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 8 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

3.name: Sweet Treats
3.description:
Gain an Artifact anvil. Your team gains 20 Health for each item equipped on champions.

Health Gained: ?

Magic N' Mayhem Tactician's Crown, 2024

3.name: Sword Overflow
3.description: Gain 4 B.F. Swords. Your B.F. Swords grant +5% Attack Speed.

3.name: The Golden Egg
3.description: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

3.name: Tiny, but Deadly
3.description: Your team becomes small, gaining 30% Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

3.name: Trifecta II
3.description:
Gain 3 3-cost champions. Allies gain 5% Attack Speed. 
Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 300 Health and 25% Attack Speed.

3.name: Walk The True Path II
3.description: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators, a Jhin, a Shen, and an Infinity Edge. Ionia 10 gains a Prismatic upgrade.

3.name: Wand Overflow
3.description: Gain 4 Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +5% Attack Speed.

3.name: Worth the Wait II
3.description:
Gain 2 copies of a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion: ?

3.name: Band of Thieves II
3.description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves. After 8 player combats, gain another.

3.name: Bronze For Life II
3.description:
Your team gains 3% Damage Amp and 4 Armor and Magic Resist for each Bronze-tier trait.

Damage Amp: ?%
Armor and Magic Resist: ?

3.name: Component Heist
3.description:
After 4 player combats, gain 1 of every item component.

? ?

3.name: Forged in Strength
3.description:
Gain 1 random Artifact. When you drop below 35 Health, gain 3 more random Artifacts.

Remix Rumble Championship, 2023

3.name: Hard Commit
3.description: Gain a random Emblem. Now and at the start of each Stage, gain a 1-star champion of that trait with a cost equal to the Stage (max 5) and 7 gold.

3.name: Hedge Fund
3.description:
Gain 25 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

3.name: Invested+
3.description: Gain 26 gold. After every combat, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

3.name: Living Forge
3.description:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 9 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

3.name: Prismatic Destiny
3.description: Gain a random Prismatic Augment and 4 gold.

3.name: Retribution
3.description: Gain 2 Hands of Justice. Allies equipped with Hand of Justice can critically strike with their Abilities.

3.name: Shimmerscale Essence
3.description:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

3.name: Tiniest Titan
3.description: Gain 2 player Health and 2 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster. Gain 15 gold now.

3.name: Upward Mobility
3.description: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 2 Health and 2 free rerolls whenever you level up.

3.name: We Stick Together
3.description:
Gain a random Emblem and a completed item anvil. Allies that share a trait with that Emblem gain 20% Attack Speed. (Emblem Trait: ?)

Into The Arcane Tactician's Crown, 2025

3.name: Woven Magic
3.description:
Gain a random item component. Every 2200 Mana your team spends grants an additional component (max ?/3).

Mana spent: ?/2200

3.name: Birthday Present
3.description: Gain a 2-star champion and 1 gold every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (max: 5-cost).

3.name: Cursed Crown
3.description: Gain +2 max team size and your team gains 4% Durability, but you take double player damage when you lose a player combat.

3.name: Luxury Subscription
3.description:
Gain a package containing a 5-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion, and 5 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain the package again.

3.name: Spoils of War III
3.description: Enemies have a 45% chance to drop loot when killed.

3.name: Tactician's Kitchen
3.description: Gain a random Emblem. After 6 rounds, gain a Tactician's Cape.

3.name: The Trait Tree
3.description: Gain 3 random Emblems and 2 gold.

3.name: The Trait Tree+
3.description: Gain 3 random Emblems, a Reforger, and 4 gold.

3.name: The World Runes
3.description: Gain 2 Emblems from random Region traits. Gain ? XP every player combat, increased to ? XP if 4 or more Region traits are active.

3.name: Win Out
3.description: When you reach level 9, immediately level to 10 and gain 2 free Shop rerolls. Gain 6 XP now.
